publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1726 Jim Tolson: The Non-Domestic Rating (Telecommunications and Canals) (Scotland) Amendment Order 2008—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Non-Domestic Rating (Telecommunications and Canals) (Scotland) Amendment Order 2008 (SSI 2008/84).
